sentences.en: But, paradoxically, as democracy gets stronger and the middle class grows richer, it can realize it has more to lose than gain from a real enfranchisement of society.
sentences.cn: 但矛盾的是，民主发展了，资产阶级也富裕了，他们却意识到从一个真正解放的社会里能失去的越来越多，能获取的越来越少。

sentences.en: It is not true that the enfranchisement of all will result in racial domination.
sentences.cn: 给予全体人民以公民权将导致种族统治,这种观点是不正确的.

words.tran_cn: 给予选举权；给予自治权；解放，释放
